trans-unit.source: Specifies the cryptographic service providers available for validating digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: 指定驗證數位簽章時可用的密碼編譯服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic service provider contains implementations of cryptographic standards and algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯服務提供者會包含密碼編譯標準和演算法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Applications can require the authentication provider name or authentication provider type of a cryptographic service provider to validate the digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以要求的驗證提供者名稱或密碼編譯服務提供者來驗證數位簽章的驗證提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: A provider type that, like <see langword="RsqSig" />, only supports hashes and digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="RsqSig" /> 之類的提供者類型只支援雜湊和數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dss" /> specifies the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA) signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dss" /> 指定數位簽章演算法 (Digital Signature Algorithm，DSA) 之簽章演算法。

trans-unit.source: A provider type that contains a set of cryptographic protocols and algorithms owned by the National Institute of Standards and Technology.
trans-unit.target: 包含密碼編譯協定和演算法集合的提供者類型是由美國國家標準與技術研究院 (National Institute of Standards and Technology) 擁有。

trans-unit.source: A provider type designed for the cryptographic needs of the Microsoft Exchange mail application and other applications compatible with Microsoft Mail.
trans-unit.target: 為密碼編譯而設計的提供者類型需要配合 Microsoft Exchange 郵件應用程式以及其他與 Microsoft Mail 相容的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This provider type is preliminary.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者類型都是初步內容。

trans-unit.source: No cryptographic provider type specified.
trans-unit.target: 沒有指定密碼編譯提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: The full RSA provider type, which supports both digital signatures and data encryption.
trans-unit.target: 完整的 RSA 提供者類型可同時支援數位簽章和資料加密。

trans-unit.source: Considered a general purpose cryptographic services provider.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮使用一般性質的密碼編譯服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: The RSA public-key algorithm is used for all public-key operations.
trans-unit.target: RSA 公開金鑰 (Public Key) 演算法則可用於所有的公開金鑰作業。

trans-unit.source: RSA Data Security, Inc., is a major developer and publisher of public-key cryptography standards.
trans-unit.target: RSA Data Security，Inc.，是主要的開發人員和公開金鑰加密標準的發行者。

trans-unit.source: The "RSA" in the name stands for the names of the company's three developers and the owners: Rivest, Shamir, and Adelman.
trans-unit.target: 名稱"RSA"代表公司的三位開發人員和擁有者的名稱： 用於、 digital signature Standard 和 Adelman。

trans-unit.source: A subset of the <see langword="RsaFull" /> provider type, which supports only those functions and algorithms required for hashes and digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="RsaFull" /> 提供者類型的子集，只支援雜湊和數位簽章所需的函式和演算法。

trans-unit.source: A provider type that supports the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 支援 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 通訊協定的提供者類型。

trans-unit.source: Secure transaction technology provider acquirer.
trans-unit.target: 安全交易技術提供者獲取者。

trans-unit.source: Secure transaction technology provider brand.
trans-unit.target: 安全交易技術提供者商標。

trans-unit.source: Secure transaction technology provider issuer.
trans-unit.target: 安全交易技術提供者簽發者。

trans-unit.source: Secure transaction technology provider enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 安全交易技術提供者企業。

trans-unit.source: Secure transaction technology provider root.
trans-unit.target: 安全交易技術提供者根目錄。
